Entries.prayWithJade: pause 150/move farmer -7 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/emote Jade 16/speak Jade "%firstnameletter-@... How much did you- nevermind...$6"/pause 2000/message "Jade wipes tears away with her sleeve."/pause 2000/speak Jade "When I was a kid, my mom decorated my room all fairy-like.$6#$b#I never got rid of it all. It was comforting, thinking they were there for me, hiding just out of sight.$6#$b#Cheering me on.$7"/pause 1500/emote Jade 28/pause 1500/speak Jade "I thought I wouldn't feel like an outcast here, but I still do.$6"/pause 1000/pause 3000/speak Jade "Thanks for being here.$7"/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.prayMock: faceDirection Jade 1/emote Jade 16/message "Jade looks to have been crying. She glares at you."/speak Jade "It's-it's not...$6"/emote Jade 28/faceDirection Jade 2/speed Jade 7/move Jade 0 6 2/speed Jade 7/move Jade -15 0 3/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.praySilent: pause 150/emote Jade 28/speak Jade "Why do you never answer me? I just need a sign that you're there. Please. I need something.#$b#This is all I have.$6"/pause 3000/emote Jade 28/message "Jade sobs at the silence. You decide to leave her be."/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
